EE.name: Metroid™
EE.description: Metroids – the most dangerous creatures in the galaxy – have fallen into the hands of Space Pirates! As bounty hunter Samus Aran, battle through the depths of planet Zebes to take out the pirates’ leader Mother Brain and restore peace to the galaxy. The original NES classic Metroid introduced gamers to a unique mix of action and exploration that has become the series’ trademark. Use Samus’s Morph Ball ability to search every nook and cranny, and uncover power-ups like the Ice Beam, Varia Suit and Screw Attack.

AT.name: Metroid™
AT.description: Die Weltraumpiraten haben Zugriff auf die gefährlichsten Kreaturen der Galaxis erhalten: Auf Metroids! Kämpfe dich als Samus Aran durch die Tiefen des Planeten Zebes, um Mother Brain auszuschalten und so den Frieden in der Galaxis wiederherzustellen. Der Original-NES-Klassiker Metroid bot den Spielern eine einmalige Mischung aus Action und Erforschen der Umgebung. Diese Mischung hat sich zum Markenzeichen der ganzen Serie entwickelt. Nutze die Möglichkeit, die dir Samus' Morph Ball bietet, um jeden Winkel des Planeten zu durchsuchen, und entdecke Power-Ups wie den Ice Beam, Varia Suit oder die Screw Attack.

The original NES classic Metroid introduced gamers to a unique mix of action and exploration that has become the series’ trademark. BE.name: Metroid™
BE.description: Les metroids, les créatures les plus dangereuses de la galaxie, sont tombés entre les mains des Pirates de l'espace ! Incarnez Samus Aran, la chasseuse de primes, et explorez la Planète Zèbes pour arrêter Mother Brain, le chef des pirates, et rétablir la paix dans la galaxie. Metroid, le classique original de la NES, a offert aux joueurs un mélange inédit d'action et d'exploration qui est devenu la signature de la série. Découvrez la technique de la Boule Morphing pour vous glisser dans toutes les failles et tous les recoins, ainsi que le Rayon de Glace, la Combinaison Varia et l'Attaque en Vrille.

ES.name: Metroid™
ES.description: Los metroids —las criaturas más peligrosas de la galaxia— han caído en manos de los Piratas Espaciales. Eres la cazarrecompensas Samus Aran, y debes adentrarte hasta las profundidades del planeta Zebes para eliminar al líder de los Piratas Espaciales, Mother Brain, y traer la paz a la galaxia. El Metroid original de NES, introdujo una mezcla única de aventura y exploración que se ha transformado en la característica principal de la serie. Usa la Morfosfera de Samus para colarte por pasadizos y descubrir mejoras como el Rayo de Hielo, el Traje Climático o el Módulo de Ataque Espiral.

CH.name: Metroid™
CH.description: Die Weltraumpiraten haben Zugriff auf die gefährlichsten Kreaturen der Galaxis erhalten: Auf Metroids! Kämpfe dich als Samus Aran durch die Tiefen des Planeten Zebes, um Mother Brain auszuschalten und so den Frieden in der Galaxis wiederherzustellen. IT.name: Metroid™
IT.description: I Metroid, le creature più pericolose della galassia, sono caduti nelle mani dei Pirati Spaziali! Mettiti nei panni della cacciatrice di taglie Samus Aran e fatti strada nei meandri del pianeta Zebes per sconfiggere Mother Brain, il leder dei Pirati, e riportare la pace nella galassia. Metroid, il classico originale per NES, fa vivere ai giocatori un avvincente mix d'azione ed esplorazione, che è diventato ormai un elemento caratteristico di tutti i titoli della serie. Trasformati in Morfosfera ed esplora gli angoli più reconditi, scopri i potenziamenti come il Raggio Gelo, la Termotuta e l'Attacco a Vite!

NL.name: Metroid™
NL.description: Metroids – de gevaarlijkste wezens van de melkweg – zijn in handen gevallen van ruimtepiraten! Jij bent premiejager Samus en je zult jezelf een weg moeten vechten naar het binnenste van de planeet Zebes om de piratenleider Mother Brain uit te schakelen en de vrede in de melkweg terug te brengen. De originele NES-klassieker Metroid bood spelers een unieke combinatie van actie en zoektochten, wat kenmerkend is geworden voor deze serie. Gebruik Samus’ Morph Ball om elk hoekje en gaatje af te zoeken, en ontdek bonusvoorwerpen als de Ice Beam, de Varia Suit en de Screw Attack.

SE.name: Metroid™
SE.description: Metroids – the most dangerous creatures in the galaxy – have fallen into the hands of Space Pirates! As bounty hunter Samus Aran, battle through the depths of planet Zebes to take out the pirates’ leader Mother Brain and restore peace to the galaxy. The original NES classic Metroid introduced gamers to a unique mix of action and exploration that has become the series’ trademark. Use Samus’s Morph Ball ability to search every nook and cranny, and uncover power-ups like the Ice Beam, Varia Suit and Screw Attack.

PT.name: Metroid™
PT.description: Os Metroids - as criaturas mais perigosas da galáxia - caíram nas mãos dos Space Pirates! Na pele da caçadora de recompensas Samus Aran, luta através das profundezas do planeta Zebes para derrotar Mother Brain, o líder dos piratas, e devolver a paz à galáxia. Metroid, o clássico original da NES, apresentou aos jogadores uma mistura única de ação e exploração, que se tornou a imagem de marca da série. Usa a habilidade Morph Ball de Samus para investigar cada recanto e fenda e descobre power-ups como Ice Beam, Varia Suit e Screw Attack.

PL.name: Metroid™
PL.description: Metroids – the most dangerous creatures in the galaxy – have fallen into the hands of Space Pirates! As bounty hunter Samus Aran, battle through the depths of planet Zebes to take out the pirates’ leader Mother Brain and restore peace to the galaxy. The original NES classic Metroid introduced gamers to a unique mix of action and exploration that has become the series’ trademark. Use Samus’s Morph Ball ability to search every nook and cranny, and uncover power-ups like the Ice Beam, Varia Suit and Screw Attack.

NO.name: Metroid™
NO.description: Metroids – the most dangerous creatures in the galaxy – have fallen into the hands of Space Pirates! As bounty hunter Samus Aran, battle through the depths of planet Zebes to take out the pirates’ leader Mother Brain and restore peace to the galaxy. The original NES classic Metroid introduced gamers to a unique mix of action and exploration that has become the series’ trademark. Use Samus’s Morph Ball ability to search every nook and cranny, and uncover power-ups like the Ice Beam, Varia Suit and Screw Attack.

RU.name: Metroid™
RU.description: Метроиды – опаснейшие в мире существа – попали в руки космических пиратов! Теперь судьба галактики зависит только от Samus Aran. Чтобы спасти жизнь во Вселенной, бесстрашная охотница за сокровищами должна спуститься в темные недра планеты Zebes и уничтожить главу пиратов Mother Brain. Динамичные боевые эпизоды в игре сменяются детальным исследованием игрового мира – это уникальное сочетание всегда отличало Metroid от остальных игровых серий. Используя навык Morph Ball, вы сможете исследовать самые труднодоступные уголки подземелий и приобрести новые способности (Ice Beam, Varia Suit и Screw Attack).
